noun.description: A large room used for formal or public events.
A private room, especially a bedroom.
examples: he had his meals brought to his chamber

noun.description: Of or for a small group of instruments.

verb.description: Place (a bullet) into the chamber of a gun.

origin: Middle English (in the sense private room): from Old French chambre, from Latin camera vault, arched chamber, from Greek kamara object with an arched cover.
